reviews.review_msg: She is such a nice professor. I love the way she teaches,her exams were ok, not hard, just do the assignments and you will be fine, however, you have to go to every class in order to understand the material. So far, she is one of my favourite profs. in linguistics.

simila policy and rules as her other class.attendance is not marked. however, attend lecture will help a lot. Exams are quite fair. exams and homework are well related. so do more practice before the exams will help a lot.
